directions: Cook pasta per package directions; drain and rinse. In a large bowl, combine first six ingredients. In a small bowl, combine dressing ingredients. Pour dressing over salad; toss. Refrigerate, or serve at room temperature.
ingredients: 1 cup dry pasta, such as macaroni or small shells
1/2 cup minced red or yellow onion
1/2 cup chopped walnuts or dry-roasted, unsalted peanuts
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
title: Curried Salmon Pasta Salad
